lines.speaker: A
lines.en: Just got out of shower ane drying my hair now. What’s up?

lines.speaker: Mom
lines.zh: 没啥事，就和你说一声，我做了些你爱吃的东西，过两天给你寄过去。
lines.en: Nothing much, just wanted to tell you that I made some of your favorite foods. I’ll mail it to you in a couple of days.

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 哦？好呀！那你顺便寄一些小咪爱吃的猫条吧，刚好快吃完了。
lines.en: Oh? Sounds great! Could you also send some of the cat treats that Mulberry likes? The pack from last time is almost finished.

lines.speaker: Mom
lines.zh: 行。另外我和你爸最近在收拾老房子，有好些你以前的东西，你要不要看看有没有什么想留着的？
lines.en: Sure. Also, your dad and I have been cleaning up the old house. There are quite a few of your old things. Do you want to check if there’s anything you want to keep?

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 嗯。。。你们看着办吧，估计也没啥贵重的。
lines.en: Hmm... You two can decide. I doubt there’s anything valuable.

lines.speaker: Mom
lines.zh: 那好。对了，失眠最近有好转吗？看你最近发的朋友圈，都无精打采的，要我说还是去看个医生吧。
lines.en: Alright. By the way, has your insomnia gotten any better? I saw your WeChat posts lately and you look so drained. I really think you should see a doctor.

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 没事儿，没事儿，就是最近事情多。我这不是进了公司有几年了吗，也到了该晋升的时候了，所以有挺多事情要考虑呢。
lines.en: It’s nothing, really. Just a lot going on. I’ve been with the company for a few years now, and it’s about time for a promotion, so there’s a lot to think about.

lines.speaker: Mom
lines.zh: 那你照顾好自己。记得提前抢过年回家的机票，别再像去年一样差点回不来。
lines.en: Take care of yourself then. Don’t forget to book your ticket home for the New Year early. Don’t end up almost being stuck and not making it back like last year.
